teamDescription1: At Green Biz Technology School, our team is the heart and soul of our institution. Committed to excellence and driven by a passion for education, each member of our team plays a vital role in shaping the future of our students.
teamDescription2: Dynamic, innovative, and dedicated, our team embodies the spirit of Green Biz Technology. We're not just educators; we're mentors, guiding our students through their journey of discovery in the world of technology.
teamDescription3: With expertise in computer fundamentals, programming, web app development, and beyond, our team members bring a wealth of knowledge and experience to the table. Together, we create an environment where learning thrives and students are empowered to reach their full potential.
teamDescription4: Our core values guide everything we do:
teamDescription5: At Green Biz Technology School, we're more than just a teamâ€”we're a family. Together, we're shaping the next generation of tech leaders and making a positive impact on the world.
Address: Kampong Svay Village, Sangkat Kampong Svay, Serei Saophoan Municipality, Banteay Meanchey Province
missionStatement: Create educational programs and technologies to instruct young individuals and establish partnerships to facilitate job placements and internships.
vissionStatement: Aspire to be a computer and technology training institute, empowering young individuals with distinct skills and high proficiency.
